summary.span: 表示 BAML 資料流中可當地語系化的資源。

span.span: Represents a localizable resource in a BAML stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是在中找到的索引鍵 / 值組的值元件。The class is the value component of the key-value pairs found in a . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 。The following example demonstrates how to use a . summary.span: 取得或設定與資源相關聯的當地語系化註解。

span.span: Gets or sets the localization comments associated with a resource.
The localization comment string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由開發人員提供的規則或提示的當地語系化人員編寫的當地語系化註解。Localization comments are authored by the developer to provide rules or hints for localizers. 註解是自由格式的字串，擷取自[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]或當地語系化註解檔案。The comments are free-form strings that are extracted from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] or from localization comments files. 若要附加的註解中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用附加的屬性，如需有關這個附加的屬性，請參閱[當地語系化屬性和註解](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。To attach comments to an element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], use the attached property For more information on this attached property, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定可當地語系化的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the localizable content.

value.span: 可當地語系化的內容字串。

span.span: The localizable content string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的子項目會以預留位置表示。Child elements by default are represented as placeholders. 預留位置以"#"字元開頭，然後子元素的 UID，則會顯示 「; 」。The placeholder starts with a "#" character, then the child element's UID, then a ";". 比方說，「 #TextBlock1; #TextBlock2; 」。For example, "#TextBlock1;#TextBlock2;". Normal"#"和";"的字元，內容會以逸出"\\」。Normal "#" and ";" characters inside the content are escaped with a "\\". 這也適用於實際"\\」 字元本身。This applies to the actual "\\" character itself. 不允許的子替代符號內容中移除，因為可能會在程式碼，可能會導致在執行階段失敗當地語系化的應用程式中參考項目。The removal of child placeholders in content is not allowed, because an element may be referenced in code, which could cause the localized application to fail at run time. 不過，它允許在當地語系化中將它們重新排序。However, it is allowed to reorder them in localizations. 在內容中的子項目也可格式化為 XML 標記來改善可讀性。Child elements in the content can also be formatted as XML markup to improve readability. 若要這樣做，當查詢的所需的項目，設定屬性設為所需的標記名稱。To do so, when queries the of a desired element, set the property to the desired tag name.

summary.span: 取得或設定資源是否可見，可以進行轉譯。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the resource is visible for translation.

value.span: 如果資源可見﹐可以進行轉譯則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the resource is visible for translation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值做為解是否可當地語系化的資源的內容可以直接轉譯為純文字的字串當地語系化工具的建議。The value serves as a recommendation to the localizer about whether the content of the localizable resource can be directly translated as plain strings. 例如，為 UI 字串使用字串"Red"時，它可以直接轉譯成另一種語言。For example, when the string "Red" is used as a UI string, it can be directly translated to another language. 在此情況下屬性應設為`true`。In this case the property should be set to `true`. 當字串"Red"做為預先定義的色彩值，無法轉譯。When the string "Red" is used as a predefined color value of a , it cannot be translated. 因此屬性應設為`false`。Therefore the property should be set to `false`.
